data.name: app_key
data.desc: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

data.name: timestamp
data.desc: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

data.name: sign_method
data.desc: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

data.name: sign
data.desc: Part of the authentication process that is used for identifying and verifying who is sending a request (click here for details)

input.desc: when specific period required, the period end time that this promotion takes effect (timestamp)
ALL_REGIONS | SPECIAL_REGIONS, when regions query api return empty just support ALL_REGIONS
when specific period required, the period start time that this promotion takes effect (timestamp)
when CAMPAIGN template type and CAMPAIGN_PRODUCTS apply type required
when SPECIAL_REGIONS  required, data from regions query api
data from delivery options query list api
the criteria that customer can enjoy shipping fee subsidy, MONEY_VALUE_FROM_X|ITEM_QUANTITY_FROM_X|NO_CONDITION

children.desc: when partial subsidy discount type requiredï¼Œshipping fee subsidy value

requestCodes.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/promotion/freeshipping/update')
request.add_api_parameter("budget_type", "UNLIMITED_BUDGET")
request.add_api_parameter("template_type", "MANUALLY")
request.add_api_parameter("apply", "ENTIRE_SHOP")
request.add_api_parameter("period_end_time", "1630339199000")
request.add_api_parameter("template_code", "null")
request.add_api_parameter("category_name", "null")
request.add_api_parameter("budget_value", "10000")
request.add_api_parameter("promotion_name", "test")
request.add_api_parameter("period_type", "SPECIAL_PERIOD")
request.add_api_parameter("region_type", "ALL_REGIONS")
request.add_api_parameter("period_start_time", "1626969600000")
request.add_api_parameter("campaign_tag", "11230")
request.add_api_parameter("region_value", "[\"ALL\"]")
request.add_api_parameter("id", "9616200353530")
request.add_api_parameter("delivery_option", "STANDARD")
request.add_api_parameter("discount_type", "PARTIAL_SUBSIDY")
request.add_api_parameter("deal_criteria", "MONEY_VALUE_FROM_X")
request.add_api_parameter("tiers", "[{\"filter\":\"100\",\"result\":\"1.5\"}]")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/promotion/freeshipping/update')
request.add_api_param('budget_type', 'UNLIMITED_BUDGET')
request.add_api_param('template_type', 'MANUALLY')
request.add_api_param('apply', 'ENTIRE_SHOP')
request.add_api_param('period_end_time', '1630339199000')
request.add_api_param('template_code', 'null')
request.add_api_param('category_name', 'null')
request.add_api_param('budget_value', '10000')
request.add_api_param('promotion_name', 'test')
request.add_api_param('period_type', 'SPECIAL_PERIOD')
request.add_api_param('region_type', 'ALL_REGIONS')
request.add_api_param('period_start_time', '1626969600000')
request.add_api_param('campaign_tag', '11230')
request.add_api_param('region_value', '[\"ALL\"]')
request.add_api_param('id', '9616200353530')
request.add_api_param('delivery_option', 'STANDARD')
request.add_api_param('discount_type', 'PARTIAL_SUBSIDY')
request.add_api_param('deal_criteria', 'MONEY_VALUE_FROM_X')
request.add_api_param('tiers', '[{\"filter\":\"100\",\"result\":\"1.5\"}]')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

data.name: period_end_time
data.desc: when specific period required, the period end time that this promotion takes effect (timestamp)

data.name: region_type
data.desc: ALL_REGIONS | SPECIAL_REGIONS, when regions query api return empty just support ALL_REGIONS

data.name: period_start_time
data.desc: when specific period required, the period start time that this promotion takes effect (timestamp)

data.name: campaign_tag
data.desc: when CAMPAIGN template type and CAMPAIGN_PRODUCTS apply type required

data.name: region_value
data.desc: when SPECIAL_REGIONS  required, data from regions query api

data.name: delivery_option
data.desc: data from delivery options query list api

data.name: deal_criteria
data.desc: the criteria that customer can enjoy shipping fee subsidy, MONEY_VALUE_FROM_X|ITEM_QUANTITY_FROM_X|NO_CONDITION

children.name: result
children.desc: when partial subsidy discount type requiredï¼Œshipping fee subsidy value
